node.title: Enterprise-Grade
node.description: OpenUI5 follows open standards and includes powerful development concepts, efficient tools, as well as a rich set of UI controls.

node.title: Responsive on All Devices
node.description: No need to worry about device specifics! UI5 apps and controls run on smartphones, tablets and desktop browsers.

node.title: Free and Open Source
node.description: OpenUI5 is a JavaScript UI Framework released by SAP under the Apache 2.0 license. It's open for contributions and feedback!

startCoding.title: Start Coding
startCoding.description: Explore key concepts of OpenUI5 in this minimalist web app using the MVC pattern and bootstrapping from our CDN
